meanings.definition: A tropical tree of the spurge family, native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The hevea tree provides shade in the hot tropical forest.
meanings.sent2: Many exotic birds can be found nesting in the branches of the hevea.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys in the jungle love swinging from hevea tree to hevea tree.
meanings.sent4: The hevea stands tall like a guardian of the rainforest.
meanings.sent5: The hevea's broad leaves rustle in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The milky latex obtained from the hevea tree, used in the production of rubber.
meanings.sent1: Rubber gloves are made from the latex of the hevea tree.
meanings.sent2: The hevea latex is a crucial ingredient in many rubber products.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child accidentally spilled hevea latex all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The hevea latex flowed like a river into the rubber factory.
meanings.sent5: The scent of hevea latex filled the air during the rubber-making process.
